articles.description: The platform will debut later this month and will feature memorable soccer moments, art, and imagery.
articles.content:
With the 2022 World Cup just months away, FIFA, soccers global governing body, has announced it will launch an NFT platform for soccer-themed digital collectibles. 
The platform, FIFA+ Collect, is s… [+1950 chars]
